io.hekate.codec.CodecFactory

    Package Description
    io.hekate.codec
    CodecService API.
    io.hekate.codec.fst
    Integration with Fast-serialization framework.
    io.hekate.codec.kryo
    Integration with Kryo serialization framework.

    CoordinationService API.
    io.hekate.core
    « start hereMain entry point to Hekate API.

    MessagingService API.

    Spring Boot integration.

    • Uses of CodecFactory in io.hekate.codec

      Classes in io.hekate.codec that implement CodecFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AutoSelectCodecFactory<T>
      Codec factory that automatically selects an underlying implementation based on what is available on the classpath.
      class  JdkCodecFactory<T>
      Codec factory that uses the standard Java Serialization API for data encoding/decoding.
      class  SingletonCodecFactory<T>
      Singleton codec factory.
      Methods in io.hekate.codec that return CodecFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> CodecFactory<T> CodecService.codecFactory()
      Returns an underlying codec factory (see HekateBootstrap.setDefaultCodec(CodecFactory)).
      CodecFactory<T> AutoSelectCodecFactory.selected()
      Returns the selected factory.
